Traffic stop leads to attempted murder arrest

Posted: Updated:
By Ali Hammond
BioEmail
Connect
Biography
ahammond@wave3.com
Melvin O'Bannon (Source: LMDC)
LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) - A suspect wanted for attempted murder was arrested following a traffic stop Friday afternoon. 

According to an arrest report, Melvin O'Bannon, 22, shot a man multiple times on October 13. The victim survived, and O'Bannon was arrested on November 7. Police say he had a gun and drug paraphernalia in the car upon his arrest. 

[SLIDESHOW: Mugshot Roundup - November 2014] 

O'Bannon is being held at Metro Corrections and is being charged with attempted murder.
